ValueSet-DecisionTableActions.title: Smart Guidelines Decision Table Actions Schema
ValueSet-DecisionTableActions.description: JSON Schema for Smart Guidelines Decision Table Actions ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
ValueSet-DecisionTableActions.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the Smart Guidelines Decision Table Actions ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/base/ValueSet-DecisionTableActions.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
